/* adm2000DAO.selectAdm2000UserList - 사용자 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT USR_ID , USR_NM , DEPT_ID , SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME , EMAIL , TELNO , AUTH_GRP_NM FROM (
SELECT B.USR_ID , B.USR_NM , B.DEPT_ID , B.EMAIL , B.TELNO , WM_CONCAT(C.AUTH_GRP_NM) AS AUTH_GRP_NM FROM ADM1300 A , ADM2000 B , ADM1100 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = C.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID
AND B.USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchPopTxt#||'%'
AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID IN ( $authGrpIds$ )
GROUP BY B.USR_ID, B.USR_NM, B.DEPT_ID, B.EMAIL, B.TELNO ) T
